title: Teatr Wielki, Charles Gounod Foust [Charles Gounod's Faust]
description: White poster with prominent, demonic figure composed of colorful swirls of dark blue, light blue, purple, green and pink. Text in black and pink in bottom right corner reads: Teatr Wielki/ Charles Gounod/ FAUST.
